groom.name: Grayfield Miracle
groom.description: The oldest Son of Mr Alexander Moningkey and Mrs Anneke Pratasik

bride.name: Cinia Eleonora
bride.description: The only Daughter of Mr Pierre de la Motte and Mrs Rita Muntu

jumbotron.quotes: Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and they shall become one flesh
jumbotron.author: Genesis 2:24

banner.quotes: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
banner.author: A. Maurois
